alert.note: Alert for Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 5:48AM CST until December 14 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 547 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Fannin, or 7 miles east of Madison, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Goshen Springs around 555 AM CST. Pisgah around 600 AM CST. Farmhaven around 620 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
